mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zhubo_info ( date, rid, name, avator, cate_id, cate_name, room_title, room_status, hn_now, hn_max, hn_total, fetch_times, hn_avg, hn_total_close, fetch_times_close, hn_avg_close, fans_num, start_time, update_time, expire_mark, duration_total, danmu_count, yc_gift_value, yw_gift_gx, gift_new_yc, gift_new_yw, gift_new_bag, fc, audience_count, danmu_person_count, gift_person_count, uenter_person_count, uenter_count, subscribe ) VALUES ( #{date}, #{rid}, #{name}, #{avator}, #{cate_id}, #{cate_name}, #{room_title}, #{room_status}, #{hn_now}, #{hn_max}, #{hn_total}, #{fetch_times}, #{hn_avg}, #{hn_total_close}, #{fetch_times_close}, #{hn_avg_close}, #{fans_num}, #{start_time}, #{update_time}, #{expire_mark}, #{duration_total}, #{danmu_count}, #{yc_gift_value}, #{yw_gift_gx}, #{gift_new_yc}, #{gift_new_yw}, #{gift_new_bag}, #{fc}, #{audience_count}, #{danmu_person_count}, #{gift_person_count}, #{uenter_person_count}, #{uenter_count}, #{subscribe} )
